website_summaries.verdict: An affordable mineral makeup that proves you don't have to spend a lot of money to look good and pamper your skin. Hands down the best deal available.
pros: A rich powder formula with surprising qualities for the value – talc free, SPF 16, and not tested on animals
Users praise it for not caking on the skin
cons: Choosing your perfect shade may be a bit challenging, as the colors are somewhat darker than expected
The packaging could be better – product easily falls out of it during use

customer_reviews.title: HOLY GRAIL LOOSE FACE POWDER
customer_reviews.text: Out of all the drugstore powders out there, Physicians Formula Mineral Wear Talc-Free Loose Powder, shade Creamy Natural, is by far the best. Period. I don't think many people know this so I'm telling you now. But LOOK OUT ~ There are two other types of this powder and, on occasion, other sellers have sent me the wrong type. So be sure to check out my pics so you can spot the differences and get the right one... because the others suck. Trust.
customer_reviews.author: beckradeck

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! I just applied and will test it out in the Louisiana heat. Like the brush, much softer than others from competitors. I still had to switch to my personal foundation brush to get the coverage needed.
customer_reviews.author: LAartsyfartsy

customer_reviews.title: Expired product received
customer_reviews.text: It was unfortunate that after reading so many amazing reviews and using the product for a couple of days I noticed that it expired on JL 2016. I recommend everyone who buy to check the expiration date.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage and looks good.
customer_reviews.text: I've used Jane Iredale mineral powder foundation and Colorscience mineral make up. I actually like this product better than the other two high end products. It has good coverage, looks natural and stays looking nice all day. I'm a nurse. I barely have time to take a bathroom break, let alone have time to reapply my make up. It's nice to use a product that I don't have to think about after I've applied it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra S Conson

customer_reviews.title: Works & cruelty free!
customer_reviews.text: Using this for the first time and I love it. It's gentle, smells good, and is cruelty free. My only con is the design. You have to take the lid of then peel a piece of plastic back each time. And in doing so, the brush falls out. I usea larger brush so I just took the tiny one out. It won't deter me from buying it again, I just find it an annoying first world problem lol.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Terepka

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic coverage and very natural looking
customer_reviews.text: I finally found a drug store powder that I like as much as the high end brands, but at a much better price. This powder leaves my skin smooth and my pores looking smaller. The coverage is fantastic and it doesn't cause my face to break out. It also doesn't settle into my lines or make me look washed out. I have an olive complexion and got it in the creamy natural color, which does look natural. I also like the flip top, which is more convenient and less messy than a twist off cover.
customer_reviews.author: Jheneya

customer_reviews.title: Great finishing powder
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, no talc or mica. Goes on smooth, I apply over foundation with a large makeup brush not the small brush provided with the powder. I usually get about three months worth with daily application. It can be worn alone as a light powder foundation but my skin has uneven pigmentation and I use it for finishing.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Ferrell

customer_reviews.title: Coverage that feels light but covers well!
customer_reviews.text: I hate hate hate wearing foundation. But not this one. It's light (don't really feel it at all), gives good coverage and lasts. You can build up coverage where needed without it caking. I did find that using a makeup primer first makes this mineral foundation last longer without breakthrough shine. Very happy with product. Bummed it's no longer produced. Buying a stash - hope they bring it back into production before I have to hunt for another product I like as well! I recommend it - if you can find it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: I bought this powder because I like that the brand is cruelty-free and I saw that it had good reviews. However, I hated the way this looked. The brush that it comes with is cheap and scratchy. When I tried to apply it with a different brush, it barely showed up, and when I tried a powder puff, it looked super cakey. It didn’t absorb oil well and I found myself having to blot my face immediately after application! I would not recommend this powder to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Medium is very light
customer_reviews.text: I like the coverage of this powder. I bought it expecting to have a darker color and I would be adding (white powder) zinc oxide to lighten the color and make the powder last longer. I bought another darker powder to do this. I'm fair skinned and this color (translucent Medium) would be the right color to use alone. I use Elta MD tinted sunscreen and put this powder on top. No other make up. Coverage is good. Will buy this again, maybe darker to add my white zinc oxide powder for additional sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: Ms A. Dema

customer_reviews.title: This makeup has been a game changer
customer_reviews.text: I've been using physicians formula brand makeup for several years now. I have combination skin, and either it would get too dry or too oily. This makeup has done wonders for my skin overall. I use it as a light layer to set my foundation and it's coverage is excellent. Enough so, that I could wear it alone. I have a pretty noticeable birthmark on my cheek and this provides enough coverage to hide it. I seldom get any kind of breakouts and it doesn't seem to clog pores near as much as other brands I've tried. It also doesn't over dry which is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Great product - soft ivory is perfect for the very fair
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this product! It's tough to figure out the right shade based on the images, even from the Physicians Formula website. The soft ivory color is a very fair shade, perfect if you're a pale person like me. I layer this over an SPF 15 BB cream and am very pleased with the coverage and sun protection. As everyone says, the packaging is a bit weird - you need to hold the plastic flap now and shake upside down to get the powder out, then use the brush to apply from there. (Initially I thought you were supposed to shake powder into the dome, but that just gets everything messy.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love physicians formula cause they use natural ingredien5s
customer_reviews.text: I love physicians formula cause they use natural ingredien5s. The reason I give 4 stars is becsuse I ordered translucent medium hoping that it would give me a little bit of color. But this one doesnt.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Just know that it's translucent
customer_reviews.text: I'm an idiot and thought this would provide coverage. It's translucent, as described. As a setting powder, it's fine - just don't be dumb like me and try to use it as foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Kris E.

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE this foundation
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this foundation. I have tried several different foundations from Sephora and ulta. I always come back to this. It gives great coverage. I always get compliments when I wear it. You cannot beat the price either! A lot of project comes in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica W.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product! Used to use bare minerals, tried many less expensive minerals foundations and found this is almost the exact same! Shipped in padded envelope which damaged the box (hence the 4 of 5) but luckily it didn't crack the plastic case. The container itself is great and a lot less messy and better for travel than other brands. I still use a bare minerals brush with it and just throw away the attached one.
customer_reviews.author: JulieS

customer_reviews.title: Works better if you break off the plastic brush holder thing
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this powder for approximately 10 years. I love this stuff. I tried switching to Smashbox, thinking I must be missing something since it was more expensive. I like this stuff much better than Smashbox, but it's really similar. Very good coverage, and not too fine of a powder so it's great for my oily/combination skin. I always break off the plastic thing that holds the brush, and then shake the powder into the round cap instead. It makes for messy traveling, but then I can use a larger brush to apply it and it comes out more easily.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Bluth

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage without being obvious
customer_reviews.text: Provides good but not heavy coverage and seems to stay put all day, even in a very humid climate. Doesn't clump up in facial lines or pores and seems to look pretty natural. I don't wear a lot of makeup, but I need a little coverage to even out my complexion. This does a good job for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kasi623

customer_reviews.title: A go-to powder
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to every day face powder that's reasonably priced and works well for my sensitive, eczema prone skin. I like this because it's light, it mattifies my face and gives me a polished look without too much coverage or a look like I'm wearing a lot of makeup. I don't wear foundation; I just wear lotion and use this power on the top. I don't use the enclosed brush - I use a fluffy brush but I'm pretty sure you could also rub and blend more powder for additional coverage if needed. A bonus is that the powder also has SPF.
customer_reviews.author: Seevuplay

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Just didn't care for it. I like mineral makeup because of how natural it looks......this product did not meet that standard. I am a toxic free/chemical free make up user and got this as backup for when i run out of my expensive stuff. After doing a little research on it, i was surprised to find that it is not as "clean" of a product as most physicians formula make up is. Threw in the garbage!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie H

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this powder! It's incredible. So glad I bought it. I still get a little dry at the end of the day but nothing compared to other makeup. And I put a bunch on. If a touch up is needed foundation goes over it like it's not even there. I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff (and I ahte makeup)
customer_reviews.text: I'm super lazy, and hate getting ready. This powder is prefect for me. It doesn't look cakey, it helps control oiliness, it has some spf, and it's easy to apply. I use a kabuki brush to put it on (probably not correctly, but oh well). I have combination skin and tend to get acne as an adult (why do the gods hate me). This doesn't make me breakout and doesn't cling to rough spots, although I do use a moisturizer spf first that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Casey KTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good for Sensitive/Acne Prone Skin!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying that I have used this powder for quite a while, and I really do like it. It matches my skin well. Only downside is the actual application can be a little messy. I end up getting powder everywhere, but that could just be me. It is not heavy coverage, I would say more light, but when used over a foundation (I use an airbrush foundation,) it works very well to give an overall even look and absorb oil.
customer_reviews.author: drchouinard

customer_reviews.title: My Go-To Mineral Make-Up
customer_reviews.text: I use this product regularly and it is always my go-to mineral make-up. I rarely need anything else, just the powder alone covers most of my acne scars (they are bad!). If I feel like I need extra coverage, I do a BB cream beforehand. I have oily skin, so no matter what I do I get oily, re-applying later in the day helps. I recommend this to anyone who has troublesome skin, it's the only one that doesn't clog my pores and create acne! Great product - I will probably use it as long it is available!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Marie

customer_reviews.title: Container makes it difficult to use and not make a big mess
customer_reviews.text: First of all the brush that comes with it is crap but that is standard with make-up. The problem is the lid is too narrow and deep to get a good size kabuki brush in there so you don't want to put the powder in the lid. However, where the powder comes out is very shallow so if you dab your brush the powder goes everywhere. It's disappointing because I actually think the powder itself is great but the packaging is such a PITA I won't order again.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 5

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have dry, sensitive skin and love this product! It lasts for a long time, and goes on nicely (with moisturizer underneath). I prefer to use a different brush.
customer_reviews.author: Emily B

customer_reviews.title: Really emphasized fine lines
customer_reviews.text: I just threw this product away. It had great reviews but I hadn't used it much since its purchase in Feb. 2019. Why not? It caked like crazy and made my skin appear very dry and wrinkled, particularly around my eyes, even when I wasn't smiling. This was regardless of whether I was wearing any sort of foundation underneath, or any variety of moisturizer. Went back to colorless translucent powder. FYI I am 46 years old and ordered Buff Beige.
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: I like this powder better then the one I was prior ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this powder better then the one I was prior using. This one actually is closer to my skin tone then one I was using then the brand I was using before. I like that I don't look orange anymore. I don't know how I feel about the lid and the brush it makes it bulkier then I would like. The powder itselfs is great though and is the best I have found for drug store brands.
customer_reviews.author: Sienna

customer_reviews.title: I have very sensitive skin and aside from being prone to acne I also *gasp* have some fine lines and wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: This is the only mineral wear type powder I can wear. I have very sensitive skin and aside from being prone to acne I also *gasp* have some fine lines and wrinkles. I like this powder because it does not settle into any of those lines and it doesn't break me out. Goof matte powder that I can wear with foundation or on it's own. No need for touch ups as the powder stays in place and does not make my face shiny.
customer_reviews.author: The Camps

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to foundation
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative to foundation. It is light on the skin but does provide good coverage. I use it exclusively during the day and may also forgo using foundation in the evenings for this product. It does not rub off on clothing or grandchildren! Also much more economical than foundation of similar quality.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Container and brush  issues
customer_reviews.text: I've used Physician's Formula face powder for many years. This presentation isn't user friendly. Brush is short, small, and very stiffish. (Yes, stiff-ish!) The container is oval. The holes powder is supposed to come out of are tiny. I kept my last container. Am going to switch from new to old.
customer_reviews.author: SB1249

customer_reviews.title: Disaster!
customer_reviews.text: This product is extremely messy. It came with powder all over the package. I stuck the whole thing in a baggie and just stick my powder brush in there to use it.. the powder is fine but the package means you will always be dealing with a powder mess.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Thorburn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for about three years now. I have very oily skin, and the cream products just melt all over my face and sink into my HUGE pores. Ugh. In contrast, Physicians Formula is perfect for my needs. I do reapply it once in the day, but that's because I have incredibly oily skin. For someone without that issue, I could see it lasting all day long. Oh, but the brush included sucks. Splurge for a real one.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Lee

customer_reviews.title: Fake?
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT Physicians Formula. This is not the fine powder and soft brush I am familiar with and I think it’s just regular face powder switched out to look like physicians formula. Very disappointing. The brush is very stiff and almost painful during application and the powder is a larger grain size, quite heavy in the tap tap step so the application process is uneven and chunky feeling.
customer_reviews.author: domrie

customer_reviews.title: I like the brush
customer_reviews.text: I like the brush, I like the color. It's a good color for someone with pale olive skin, plenty of yellow in the base. But I can't get it to cover my blemishes like I did with the discontinued Physican's Formula pressed powder. I've tried applying it the same way and am getting frustrated because most of the product ends up on my shirt, not my cheeks
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best!
customer_reviews.text: PF is the only brand of mineral make up I'll use, and I have tried them ALL (even the expensive brands you're thinking of.) I like how this formula looks even better than airbrushed makeup which isn't supposed to be possible for a powder. This little tub is absolutely magic! PLEASE never stop making it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great foundation!
customer_reviews.text: I love this foundation! I have rosacea, and I needed something that would cover, but that wasn't thick. I've been buying this for years now because this is wonderful at both! It is light and soft on the skin, but is covers my rosacea and makes my face even toned. I can even wear it to bed because it is so light and breathable! It doesn't make my face breakout like regular foundation. I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: SmileyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money, just get mineral hygenics if you have sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: not only does this powder smell weird, but the brush is horrible and made my skin itch. I bought this powder a while ago when i still was getting horrifying breakouts and I'm pretty sure it made it worse. Don't waste your money, you get what you pay for when it comes to powder foundation. i'll stick to the best powder foundation in the game, Mineral Hygenics
customer_reviews.author: katie hudson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: It came in a big mess (I guess I can blame the packaging or shipping for that). But very messy when I opened it for the first time. The brush included is not soft or comfortable at all, especially since I have sensitive skin, so I use my own brush. Otherwise, it goes on nicely and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: PR

customer_reviews.title: The packaging is horrible. The powder was all over the inside of ...
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is horrible. The powder was all over the inside of the container ;( It made a huge mess when I opened it. On the plus side the product is fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Kniss

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT WAS POSSIBLE IMITATION/ COPY CAT
customer_reviews.text: THIS WAS NOT TRUE MINERAL WEAR BY PHYSICIANS FORMULA, POWDER WAS THIN AND STUCK TO THE CONTAINER, THE BRUSH WAS VERY SHINY AND ALMOST PLASTIC LIKE. i HAVE USED THEIR PRODUCTS FOR YEARS AND THIS WAS NOT PHYSICIANS FORMULA. THE BOTTOM OF THE CONTAINER WAS ALSO LABELED DIFFERENTLY. CHINA KNOCKOFF!
customer_reviews.author: lynell

customer_reviews.title: Eh.
customer_reviews.text: The brush is too stiff, the powder is almost two shades too dark (translucent? I think not). and when I use a soft face brush, it went all over everything worse than any other powder I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: SewCreative

customer_reviews.title: My go to for over ten years.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for years. Great stuff. This is what I do when I get it. I take off the lid. Take the brush out. Rip that plastic holder out! (Please recycle) Put that top back on. Shake it upside down so there's powder in the lid. Dip the brush in the lid. 😊. I keep the brushes for other things btw.
customer_reviews.author: KellyClayWoo

customer_reviews.title: Does not give much cover
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful feeling powder but the coverage is very light. If you have any imperfections it will not cover them. The color was much lighter than expected as well. I now use it as a finishing powder over my regular foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Jill gruen

customer_reviews.title: Great Mineral Wear Foundation
customer_reviews.text: Love this mineral wear powder! I have a hard time finding my color and light feeling foundation, this is the only foundation I can use that matches my skin tone. This product is great for older women, and also provides spf protection.
customer_reviews.author: Susie W.

customer_reviews.title: Too yellow for my skin tone
customer_reviews.text: Very yellow and I ended up unable to wear this because I looked like a banana. I’m sure others it looks great on. Other than that it was dry in a bad way and made me feel like I was caked im my makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Haven't found any other powder that works as good as this gem!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish physicians formula didn't chance this product!! Hopefully they will continue making this exact one! Full coverage powder. Doesn't cause break outs. I use my own brush not the one that is included, but I feel most ppl use their own seperate brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Seems more like a mineral foundation than a loose powder
customer_reviews.text: This was just OK for me. Seems more like a mineral foundation than a loose powder. It did not do much for shine control. I am a huge fan of the brush holder in the top of the container, just wish the brush was better. I did feel like it settled into my lines after a little while. I used it for a few weeks and have switched to something but will hold on to it for a back up. Very doubtful that I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My holy grail foundation
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this loose powder mineral makeup for years. I keep repurchasing! It's easy to apply, Translucent Medium is the perfect shade for me, and my skin likes it (no break-outs!). I hope PF makes it forever!
customer_reviews.author: ennui

customer_reviews.title: ... lot of makeup over the years and I always recommend this product for anyone looking to cover their acne
customer_reviews.text: I have used a lot of makeup over the years and I always recommend this product for anyone looking to cover their acne. Foundation and concealer will get you far but a good powder is soooooo important. I use this product religiously and it doesn't cause irritation or cause breakouts. I swear by this and there's tons of product in here and it's so much more affordable and lasts longer than the higher end brands (mac, sephora).
customer_reviews.author: Annalisa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: As with most Physician's Formula products, it's perfect. I wear powder about 18 hrs. a day, so I re apply after about 10 hrs. I have very oily skin. If you have dry skin, I wouldn't think you'd have to do this more than once a day.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie 9

customer_reviews.title: Very nice powder
customer_reviews.text: Feels light and hasn’t broken me out. Bare minerals broke me out horrible but this doesn’t. I use my own brush.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad brush, okay coverage
customer_reviews.text: I like this color, and it's the foundation I use most often. Definitely trash the brush though - it really, really sucks. Get your own brush and just use the powder.
customer_reviews.author: Kris E.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, not so great container
customer_reviews.text: Great product but the container in which it comes in is not the best as it gets all over the brush if you put it in your bag and it moves around. Other than that, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the dumbest design for make up ever. The thing is cheap and doesn’t stay together. Not good for travel or carrying with you. Go with presses powder
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: Everything physicians formula is my go to. I always feel like I look great wearing it, and it does not feel heavy, or look to bright!
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: Talc free!
customer_reviews.text: I use this instead of foundation and it lasts all night (I work nights). I must say, however, the ivory and creamy natural colors are not fair enough for my liking, but still a great product.
customer_reviews.author: M Biondo

customer_reviews.title: Will never use liquid foundation again
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for over 7 years. I love the coverage it gives. I tried going back to a liquid foundation a couple years ago and nothing evens out my skin like this does. I will never use liquid foundation again. I love this stuff. I buy a separate, large brush to apply. Just be sure to wash your brush occasionally as the build up from the powder can cause breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Physicians Formula mineral powder is the best. It provides light coverage without making your skin feel heavily coated. It looks natural. It is getting hard to find where I live so I was happy to find it online and for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Di G.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Not a smooth mineral finish
customer_reviews.text: This just feels powdery, accentuating wrinkles and just feels like it sitting on top of my skin... does not blend well
customer_reviews.author: DONALD F ALBERT III

customer_reviews.title: DEB
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about how many words i have to write but YUCK. Didnt know what i was thinking but you can buy this in the corner drugstore. Its cakey and when you finally rub and rub to get it even it has a weird lite burning sensation or something. I ordered missha bb cream on anothers reviewers advice and have never used a make up thats so delicious. Im going to try their cashmere powder. I figure if the bb cream is so awesome the powder may be too.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah iwanowiczzz

customer_reviews.title: This brand is good because they're cruelty-free
customer_reviews.text: This brand is good because they're cruelty-free, but I was bummed to find that the "translucent light" actually does still have some tint to it. It's fine during the summer when I'm a little tan, but when I'm really pale in the winter, you can definitely tell that there's some color to it. It also stains my sink. :/
customer_reviews.author: shiba

customer_reviews.title: I like it...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this loose powder I wish this company would make darker shades it is really nice and light on the skin try it you’ll like it...I apply over a darker shade to get the shade I like...it’s not oily
customer_reviews.author: ALN

customer_reviews.title: Nice powder
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight but good coverage. It takes a little practice to get it on perfectly, but it’s worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: ShelYeah

customer_reviews.title: I'm really happy with this powder
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with this powder. It offers good coverage it does not feel heavy or clog my pores, it goes on easy and the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie & Steve R.

customer_reviews.title: The only foundation that I will buy
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for more than 8 years. After the first time I tried it, I thought - "wow, this is great, so I bet expensive versions will be even better!" and tried a Bare Minerals equivalent for about $30. It was no where near as nice as this product. I love that this one blends really well with my skin tone, so that it doesn't really look like I'm wearing foundation, but my skin looks super smooth and blemish-free.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Trippett

customer_reviews.title: Use your own brush...
customer_reviews.text: Good product, provides a matte finish to my look. Physicians Formula is one of my favorite brand and I don't have to worry about the ingredients. However, the color of this loose powder is lighter than I expected, and I really, really don't like the brush that came with. It feels so rough on my skin as if it was supposed to be scrubbing! So I use another softer foundation brush of my own to apply. Other than those, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Best facial cover on the market
customer_reviews.text: I use the creamy natural color.... I searched for years trying to find a makeup that would cover my facial pores to create a smooth complexion and calm my reddish complexion making an even, natural color. I also do not like my face to feel like it's coated with makeup. This successfully has proven to be perfect. I've used it for several years and cannot imagine not having it as my mainstay for any and all occasions. Then I was thrilled to find it at Amazon.com...with, as usual, a nice price.
customer_reviews.author: L. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Paid a little more that you would of at the store but the fast delivery makes up for it. I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mera

customer_reviews.title: Like the makeup
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. But tried to order multiple items and was charged shipping for each one.
customer_reviews.author: Raechel Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Coverage
customer_reviews.text: I am not impressed by the brush or the product. I like a loose power, but this product is to heavy and I don't like the appearance on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Donahue

customer_reviews.title: Sheer coverage
customer_reviews.text: Light and sheer coverage without getting cakey. Good for mature skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product
